cohortName: [PL 4281232001] Type B viral hepatitis referent concept incident cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants with >=365d prior observation
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (4281232) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 4281232002] Type B viral hepatitis referent concept prevalent cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (4281232) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.
Viral Hepatitis B Niu (2016) 1+ codes In-patient or 2+ codes out-patient within 365 D of cirrhosis (1+ codes inpatient or 2+ codes outpatient ICD-9-CM codes for cirrhosis:  ICD-9-CM-571.2, 571.5)
Viral Hepatitis B Niu (2016) 2+ codes In-patient or 2+ codes out-patient within 365 D of cirrhosis (1+ codes inpatient or 2+ codes outpatient ICD-9-CM codes for cirrhosis:  ICD-9-CM-571.2, 571.5)
Viral Hepatitis B Niu (2016) 1+ codes In-patient AND 2+ codes out-patient within 365 D of cirrhosis (1+ codes inpatient or 2+ codes outpatient ICD-9-CM codes for cirrhosis:  ICD-9-CM-571.2, 571.5)
